sourcesContent:
<template src="./template.html"></template>
<style src="./style.css"></style>
<script>
    export default {
  name: "SimpleWindow",
  
  props: {
    windowId: String,
    title: {
      type: String,
      default: 'Окно'
    },
    appName: {
      type: String,
      default: 'app'
    },
    isMinimized: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    isActive: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    isMaximized: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    }
  },
  
  emits: ['close', 'minimize', 'focus', 'toggleMaximize'],
  
  data() {
    return {
      posX: 100,
      posY: 100,
      windowWidth: 400,
      windowHeight: 300,
      isDragging: false,
      isResizing: false,
      dragOffset: { x: 0, y: 0 },
      resizeDirection: '',
      originalState: null,
      
      // Настройки прилипания
      snapThreshold: 15,
      isSnapped: false
    }
  },
  
  computed: {
    isVisible() {
      return !this.isMinimized
    },
    
    windowStyles() {
      const baseStyles = {
        zIndex: this.isActive ? 1000 : 100
      }
      
      if (this.isMaximized) {
        return {
          ...baseStyles,
          left: '0',
          top: '0',
          width: '100vw',
          height: '100vh',
          borderRadius: '0',
          opacity: this.isActive ? 1 : 0.9
        }
      } else {
        return {
          ...baseStyles,
          left: `${this.posX}px`,
          top: `${this.posY}px`,
          width: `${this.windowWidth}px`,
          height: `${this.windowHeight}px`,
          opacity: this.isActive ? 1 : 0.85
        }
      }
    }
  },
  
  watch: {
    isMaximized(newVal) {
      if (newVal && !this.originalState) {
        this.saveOriginalState()
      } else if (!newVal && this.originalState) {
        this.restoreOriginalState()
      }
    }
  },
  
  mounted() {
    document.addEventListener('mousemove', this.handleMouseMove)
    document.addEventListener('mouseup', this.handleMouseUp)
    
    this.keepWindowInBounds()
  },
  
  beforeUnmount() {
    document.removeEventListener('mousemove', this.handleMouseMove)
    document.removeEventListener('mouseup', this.handleMouseUp)
  },
  
  methods: {
    activateWindow(e) {
      // Активно только если кликнули не на элемент с @click.stop
      if (!e.defaultPrevented) {
        this.$emit('focus', this.windowId)
      }
    },
    // Обработчик двойного клика по заголовку
    handleDoubleClick(e) {
      e.stopPropagation() // Останавливаем всплытие
      const header = e.target.closest('.window-header')
      const controls = e.target.closest('.window-controls')
      
      if (header && !controls) {
        this.toggleMaximize()
      }
    },
    
    // Обработчик клика по заголовку
    onHeaderMouseDown(e) {
      e.stopPropagation() // Останавливаем всплытие
      
      // Сначала активируем окно
      this.$emit('focus', this.windowId)
      
      if (this.isMaximized) {
        return
      }
      
      this.startDrag(e)
    },
    
    // Обработчик клика по содержимому
    onContentMouseDown() {
      this.$emit('focus', this.windowId)
    },
    
    saveOriginalState() {
      this.originalState = {
        posX: this.posX,
        posY: this.posY,
        windowWidth: this.windowWidth,
        windowHeight: this.windowHeight
      }
    },
    
    restoreOriginalState() {
      if (this.originalState) {
        this.posX = this.originalState.posX
        this.posY = this.originalState.posY
        this.windowWidth = this.originalState.windowWidth
        this.windowHeight = this.originalState.windowHeight
        
        this.keepWindowInBounds()
      }
    },
    
    startDrag(e) {
      this.isDragging = true
      this.dragOffset = {
        x: e.clientX - this.posX,
        y: e.clientY - this.posY
      }
    },
    
    startResize(direction) {
      if (this.isMaximized) return
      
      this.isResizing = true
      this.resizeDirection = direction
      this.resizeStartX = this.posX
      this.resizeStartY = this.posY
      this.resizeStartWidth = this.windowWidth
      this.resizeStartHeight = this.windowHeight
      this.resizeStartMouseX = event.clientX
      this.resizeStartMouseY = event.clientY
    },
    
    handleMouseMove(e) {
      if (this.isDragging && !this.isMaximized) {
        let newX = e.clientX - this.dragOffset.x
        let newY = e.clientY - this.dragOffset.y
        
        const snappedPosition = this.checkSnap(newX, newY)
        newX = snappedPosition.x
        newY = snappedPosition.y
        
        this.posX = newX
        this.posY = newY
        
        this.preventOffscreenDuringDrag()
        
      } else if (this.isResizing && !this.isMaximized) {
        this.handleResize(e)
      }
    },
    
    checkSnap(x, y) {
      const screenWidth = window.innerWidth
      const screenHeight = window.innerHeight
      
      let snappedX = x
      let snappedY = y
      this.isSnapped = false
      
      if (Math.abs(x) < this.snapThreshold) {
        snappedX = 0
        this.isSnapped = true
      }
      
      if (Math.abs(x + this.windowWidth - screenWidth) < this.snapThreshold) {
        snappedX = screenWidth - this.windowWidth
        this.isSnapped = true
      }
      
      if (Math.abs(y) < this.snapThreshold) {
        snappedY = 0
        this.isSnapped = true
      }
      
      if (Math.abs(y + this.windowHeight - screenHeight) < this.snapThreshold) {
        snappedY = screenHeight - this.windowHeight
        this.isSnapped = true
      }
      
      return { x: snappedX, y: snappedY }
    },
    
    preventOffscreenDuringDrag() {
      const screenWidth = window.innerWidth
      const screenHeight = window.innerHeight
      
      if (this.posX < 0) {
        this.posX = 0
      }
      
      if (this.posX + this.windowWidth > screenWidth) {
        this.posX = screenWidth - this.windowWidth
      }
      
      if (this.posY < 0) {
        this.posY = 0
      }
      
      if (this.posY + this.windowHeight > screenHeight) {
        this.posY = screenHeight - this.windowHeight
      }
    },
    
    handleResize(e) {
      const deltaX = e.clientX - this.resizeStartMouseX
      const deltaY = e.clientY - this.resizeStartMouseY
      
      const minWidth = 200
      const minHeight = 150
      
      let newWidth = this.resizeStartWidth
      let newHeight = this.resizeStartHeight
      let newX = this.resizeStartX
      let newY = this.resizeStartY
      
      if (this.resizeDirection.includes('e')) {
        newWidth = Math.max(minWidth, this.resizeStartWidth + deltaX)
      }
      
      if (this.resizeDirection.includes('w')) {
        newWidth = Math.max(minWidth, this.resizeStartWidth - deltaX)
        newX = this.resizeStartX + (this.resizeStartWidth - newWidth)
      }
      
      if (this.resizeDirection.includes('s')) {
        newHeight = Math.max(minHeight, this.resizeStartHeight + deltaY)
      }
      
      if (this.resizeDirection.includes('n')) {
        newHeight = Math.max(minHeight, this.resizeStartHeight - deltaY)
        newY = this.resizeStartY + (this.resizeStartHeight - newHeight)
      }
      
      this.posX = newX
      this.posY = newY
      this.windowWidth = newWidth
      this.windowHeight = newHeight
      
      this.keepResizeInBounds()
    },
    
    keepResizeInBounds() {
      const minWidth = 200
      const minHeight = 150
      const screenWidth = window.innerWidth
      const screenHeight = window.innerHeight
      
      if (this.posX + this.windowWidth > screenWidth) {
        this.windowWidth = screenWidth - this.posX
      }
      
      if (this.posY + this.windowHeight > screenHeight) {
        this.windowHeight = screenHeight - this.posY
      }
      
      this.windowWidth = Math.max(minWidth, this.windowWidth)
      this.windowHeight = Math.max(minHeight, this.windowHeight)
      
      if (this.posX + this.windowWidth > screenWidth) {
        this.posX = screenWidth - this.windowWidth
      }
      
      if (this.posY + this.windowHeight > screenHeight) {
        this.posY = screenHeight - this.windowHeight
      }
      
      this.posX = Math.max(0, this.posX)
      this.posY = Math.max(0, this.posY)
      
      if (this.windowWidth < minWidth) {
        this.windowWidth = minWidth
      }
      
      if (this.windowHeight < minHeight) {
        this.windowHeight = minHeight
      }
    },
    
    handleMouseUp() {
      if (this.isDragging) {
        this.keepWindowInBounds()
        this.isSnapped = false
      }
      
      if (this.isResizing) {
        this.keepResizeInBounds()
      }
      
      this.isDragging = false
      this.isResizing = false
    },
    
    keepWindowInBounds() {
      const minWidth = 200
      const minHeight = 150
      const screenWidth = window.innerWidth
      const screenHeight = window.innerHeight
      
      this.windowWidth = Math.max(minWidth, this.windowWidth)
      this.windowHeight = Math.max(minHeight, this.windowHeight)
      
      if (this.posX + this.windowWidth > screenWidth) {
        this.posX = screenWidth - this.windowWidth
      }
      
      if (this.posY + this.windowHeight > screenHeight) {
        this.posY = screenHeight - this.windowHeight
      }
      
      this.posX = Math.max(0, this.posX)
      this.posY = Math.max(0, this.posY)
      
      if (this.posX + this.windowWidth > screenWidth) {
        this.windowWidth = screenWidth - this.posX
      }
      
      if (this.posY + this.windowHeight > screenHeight) {
        this.windowHeight = screenHeight - this.posY
      }
      
      this.windowWidth = Math.max(minWidth, this.windowWidth)
      this.windowHeight = Math.max(minHeight, this.windowHeight)
      
      if (this.windowWidth < minWidth) {
        this.windowWidth = minWidth
        this.posX = Math.max(0, Math.min(this.posX, screenWidth - minWidth))
      }
      
      if (this.windowHeight < minHeight) {
        this.windowHeight = minHeight
        this.posY = Math.max(0, Math.min(this.posY, screenHeight - minHeight))
      }
    },
    
    minimize() {
      this.$emit('minimize', this.windowId)
    },
    
    toggleMaximize() {
      this.$emit('toggleMaximize', this.windowId)
    },
    
    close() {
      this.$emit('close', this.windowId)
    }
  }
}
</script>
